title: Highly selective capture and efficient concentration of trace titanium dioxide nanoparticles in environmental waters by phosphorylated ferroferric oxide
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00095A, Paper
Ronggang Zheng, Sujuan Yu, Rui Yang, Peng Li, Qingcun Li, Li Li, Yuhang Chen, Yaqi Cai, Jingfu Liu
Selectively and efficiently capturing trace titanium dioxide nanoparticles (TiO2NPs) in environmental waters is a prerequisite for their determination to understand their occurrence, behavior and effects in the environment.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
